Package sample

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Client
    This client class contains the characteristics for the client that will be interacting with the program such as the room name, payment status, dates, and the amount owed.
    ClientScreenController
    This client controller class implements all actions done on the client screen
    CustodianScreenController
    This client controller class implements all actions done on the client screen
    CustomerBooking
    This class contains all the characteristics needed for a customer booking, such as the invoice number, name, the room, date, costs, whether the booking is paid or not, and the check in status of the customer.
    DatabaseManager
    This class contains all the database operation.
    DateAndCostManager
    This class helps to validate the room booking info, taxrate calculation date validation
    DeskAssistantController
    This method is for the desk assistant controller where all the action by the desk assitant are intitated and completed
    ImageLoader
    This class is for the image to load.
    ImageSprite
    This class does nothing.
    Main
    This is class is the main class of the program which makes use of methods that create error/info screens to appear when needed.
    MainScreenController
    This is the screen switch controller with the method that helps to move from one screen to another when necessary
    OwnerScreenController
    There are three tabs in this class's associate screen In one tab Owner can see all the room status, checkin status, payment status.
    PaymentScreenController
    This method implements all the actions done on the Payment Screen
    ResetPasswordOwnerController
    This ResetPasswordOwner controller class implements all the actions done on the ResetPasswordOwner
    SignIn
    Signin controller to load sign in directly
    SignInController
    SignInController controls the user login which validates the password and userid and give user a choice of selecting the type of user
    SignUpController
    Signup controller reads all the user input and validate it for new users and send the information back to the database and create a new user profile and a table under their name
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Country
    Enum for country list
    PricePerNight
    Enum for the prices per night for each room.
    State
    Enum list for all states in the United States.
